works.title: Toolmetics
works.desc: Website that provides whatsapp bulk message service for any business

works.title: Sahaj Mahila Sambriddhi
works.desc: Coorporation's robust website that have in built CMS with dynamic UI. Feature for writing and publishing blogs.

works.title: Devam Career Hub
works.desc: Education and career consultancy porfolio website. Contain WYSIWYG blogging

works.title: Bigefforts
works.desc: Australina based cleaning service provider website. Has dynamic content and admin panel in bult to update most of the parts

projects.title: ALPR
projects.desc: Automatic License Plate Recognizion system which can detect license plate from a image and recognize the characters. YOLOv8 with custom trained CNN model with EMNIST dataset is used.

projects.title: Fake News Detection
projects.desc: Supervised model that uses logistic regression for detecting if the news is fake or genuine. It uses title, author, and text content as attribute to predict

projects.title: Maiboard
projects.desc: A android mobile application developed using Java. It was project developed during Janakpur Hackathon 2023. It has feature of translation maithili to english and vice versa and live OCR.

projects.title: Passsaver
projects.desc: Pyhon script that stores and retrieve password on demand. Stores password in sqlite db. Basic Caeser cipher ecrypter is used, so it is unspoken to not use

projects.title: YT like Clone
projects.desc: Youtube like application. Experimentation project to probe the video segmentation using ffmpeg

projects.title: Mini Hotloader
projects.desc: Script that watches a directory or file if it has changed. If changed then runs given command automatically i.e, external hot reload.
